import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Login } from '../login'; import { SharingService } from '../sharing-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-checkout', templateUrl: './checkout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./checkout.component.css'] }) export class CheckoutComponent implements OnInit{ currentUser: Login | undefined; hasCheckedOut: boolean= false; constructor( private sharingService: SharingService, private router: Router ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.currentUser= this.sharingService.getData(); } checkout(): void{ if(this.currentUser){ this.currentUser.cart =[]; this.hasCheckedOut= true; this.sharingService.setData(this.currentUser); } } goToDashboard(): void{ this.router.navigateByUrl("/dashboard"); } }
